title: Sleep Paralysis Demon

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-During the day, force someone to experience sleep paralysis, roleblocking them that night, as well as letting you talk to them anonymously
-Traumatize your target, roleblocking them through immunities for the next 3 nights, and making them deal a basic attack to any visitors (3 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-You do not physically exist until you’re attacked. Until your autovest breaks, you don’t count for the majority of votes needed, though you may still vote
-Once your autovest breaks, you’ll automatically have your attacker be your next target, but you may not speak with them nor do you know who they are
-Until your autovest breaks, your visits are astral

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have 5 people get killed via a traumatized target, OR live to see the good faction(s) lose the game

desc:
Post 3541
_You know that feeling of like, being awake at night, but you also can’t move and see a giant shadow in the corner of your room? Yeah, that’s me_
